brand_info.name: Mercedes-Benz
brand_info.positioning: High-end passenger cars and premium vans positioned as a global benchmark for luxury, safety, comfort, and engineering innovation.
brand_info.vision: Shape the future of mobility through continuous innovation, with a clear commitment to sustainability, integrity, and diversity as guiding principles.
brand_info.mission: Build desirable vehicles and mobility experiences that set standards in technology, safety, and design, delivering premium quality for customers worldwide.
brand_info.origin_story: The Mercedes-Benz brand emerged in 1926 with the creation of Daimler-Benz AG through the merger of Daimler-Motoren-Gesellschaft (DMG) and Benz & Cie., uniting pioneering automotive inventions dating back to 1886.

brand_values.brand_promise: Relentless commitment to premium excellence in design, technology, comfort, and safety.
differentiators: Heritage rooted in the invention of the automobile
Iconic three-pointed star as a symbol of aspiration and mastery
non_negotiables: No compromise on quality and safety

psychographics.lifestyle: Professionals and aspirational achievers who value performance, comfort, design, and technological confidence
psychographics.behavior: Research-driven purchase behavior, expects premium service, attracted to heritage-backed innovation and brand symbolism

tone_of_voice.communication_style: Minimal, declarative, and premium; short statements with strong emotional clarity.
avoid: Excessive technical jargon in headline copy

logo.primary_logo: Three-pointed star (standalone) and Mercedes-Benz wordmark lockup
logo.usage_rules: Keep high contrast and clear space; place in uncluttered areas; avoid overlaying on complex textures or faces.
logo.lockup_behavior: Often top-centered or bottom-centered; wordmark paired with star for signature moments.
logo.safe_area: Minimum padding equals at least the star diameter (or the logo height for wordmark lockups).

color_system.color_usage_rules: Preference for cool, deep blues and neutral metallics supporting the vehicle finish; gradients are used only as natural skies and atmospheric falloff, not as UI decoration.

layout_principles.grid_system: Modular editorial grid with strong top/bottom bands
layout_principles.cta_placement: Centered or upper-mid in a framed button; or lower third for print
layout_principles.alignment: Centered brand signature; text aligned to clean margins

preferred_photographers: Brand-led global production roster (varies by market/campaign)
style.camera_feel: High-end cinematic advertising stills with dramatic depth, motion energy, and controlled reflections.
style.pose_guidelines: If talent is present: composed, understated, fashion-forward; no exaggerated expressions.
style.casting_attitude: Modern confidence, calm control, aspirational restraint

technical.lighting: Naturalistic cinematic light (golden hour, dusk, or controlled studio-like shaping on the car)
technical.depth_of_field: Moderate; subject separation via distance, haze, or motion
technical.color_grading: Cool-to-neutral with deep blues; metallic highlights preserved; skin tones natural when present

model_casting.diversity: Yes, modern and inclusive casting when talent is used

product_presentation.hero_visibility: Vehicle is the primary hero; always cleanly readable silhouette and badge
product_presentation.styling_approach: Realistic reflections, premium surfaces, uncluttered surroundings; emphasize stance and proportions

motion_rules.pacing: Confident and controlled; can be dynamic but never chaotic
motion_rules.transitions: Clean cuts, smooth dissolves, and elegant title overlays

visual_dos: Highlight star emblem and grille identity
Use cinematic atmosphere (haze, dusk, sky gradients)
visual_donts: Cheap effects that warp body lines

test_zone: Typographic treatments and kinetic blur effects
Surreal-but-premium compositions that keep car geometry intact

digital.tone_adjustment: Even more minimal; fast-read headlines; strong hero visuals; short CTAs

platform_behavior.Instagram: Hero car frames with minimal copy and strong atmosphere
platform_behavior.Website: Full-bleed imagery with clear modular sections and high contrast UI
platform_behavior.Newsletter: Hero image + one headline + one CTA

print.cover_rules: Large negative space, centered logo signature, restrained headline in upper zone

logo_misuse_examples: Logo placed on busy textures with low contrast
Logo used as a pattern fill
